<<<<<<< HEAD
A replie to M. Calfhills blasphemous answer made against the Treatise of the crosse, by Iohn Martiall, Bachiler of Lawe, and studient in diuinitie. Reade and regarde Martiall, John, 1534-1597.
[24], 1-8, 8-227 leaves
By Iohn Bogard at the Golden Bible with the Kinges Maiesties priuilege, Imprinted at Louaine : 1566.
A reply to: Calfhill, James. An aunswere to the Treatise of the crosse, which is itself a reply to: Martiall, John. A treatyse of the crosse. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[24], 1-8, 8-227 leaves
By Iohn Bogard at the Golden Bible with the Kinges Maiesties priuilege, Imprinted at Louaine : 1566.
A reply to: Calfhill, James. An aunswere to the Treatise of the crosse, which is itself a reply to: Martiall, John. A treatyse of the crosse. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
